Articles.Content:
Good morning,

Im hoping that the developers keep the launch plumes pluming until the plume of the engines clear the tower.

Same with the orange glow beneath the launch pad, it needs to continue until engine plume clears tower.  Also orange glow needs to sputter out.  Right now the whole glow just turns off after a certain point.   Having it flicker and sputter then turn off would like better.  Minor details I know.  But little details add immersion.  

Thank for your time.
The launch cloud is fake anyway. It shoots regardless if you actually fire the engines lol.
Amazing comment!!   So glad for the contribution.
